name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: VideoAnyGPT: Make Video from Web Page
name.es: VideoAnyGPT: Crear vídeo desde página web
name.fr: VideoAnyGPT : Créer une vidéo à partir d'une page web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Generate video by understanding images and content on web page.
short.de: Generieren Sie ein Video, indem Sie Bilder und Inhalte auf der Webseite verstehen.
short.es: Genera vídeos entendiendo imágenes y contenido en la página web.
short.fr: Générez des vidéos en comprenant les images et le contenu de la page web.
short.ko: 웹 페이지의 이미지와 콘텐츠를 이해하여 비디오를 생성합니다.
short.ru: Создание видео, понимая изображения и контент на веб-странице.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate video by understanding images and content on web page.

Advanced Settings: Customize your video creation process with advanced settings to tailor the output to your exact requirements.

Multiple Voice Options: Choose from a variety of voices to narrate your videos, adding depth and personality to your content.

Background Video: Enhance your videos by adding background visuals to create a more engaging viewing experience.
